name: Nepali speech recognition
short_description:
Very first software tool to recognize Nepali speech.

Nepali speech recognition is speech recognition software specially developed for Nepali langauge.
Software is outcome of final year pr
oject for National college of Engineering, Bachelor in Computer Engineering course.
It is developed By Krishna Bhattarai, Saurav Kuwar, Ajaya Kalakheti and Sukrit Adhikari. Software is developed under the co-ordination of Mr. Bikash Balami.
The primary function of the project is to recognize continuous sound waveform and convert into Nepali text.

This software first attempt to develop nepali speech recognition. Till the date, there are no other software which can recognize nepali speech. So we think our initiation will be continued in the future.
Software is not 100% accurate and limited in terms of dictionary and grammar. We hope the vision we've created will be helpful to other developer which want to work in Nepali speech Recognition task.
summary: Recognize nepali speech. Convert speech to nepali text
